caption.p: Pharmacological activities of C. longa related to hepatobiliary diseases. C. longa exhibited hepatoprotective, antioxidant, antisteatotic/hypolipidemic, anti-inflammatory, antifibrotic, antitumor, and cholagogic effects via regulating apoptosis, CYP2E1, Nrf, lipid metabolism-related signaling factors, TGF- β, NF- κB, CYP7A1, and so on.
